title: Sync alpha release issue to Beads
description:
## Context

This tracks syncing the Alpha Release meta issue from GitHub to Beads.

**GitHub Issue**: https://github.com/Open-Harness/open-harness/issues/72
- Title: ðŸš€ Alpha Release Preparation (Meta Issue)
- Contains 15+ sub-issues for alpha prep work

## Migration Plan

We're transitioning issue tracking:
- **FROM**: GitHub Issues (manual, web UI dependent)
- **TO**: Beads + Linear (AI-native, CLI-first)

### Why
- Beads works natively with AI agents (no API keys, no context switching)
- Linear provides a nice web UI for humans who need it
- GitHub Issues will be deprecated for new work

### Next Steps
1. Set up Linear integration (`bd linear sync`)
2. Import existing alpha-prep issues from GitHub â†’ Beads
3. Stop creating new GitHub issues
4. Use Beads for all agent work, Linear for human visibility

title: Fix TypeScript errors in docs package
description:
## Problem

The docs package has TypeScript errors blocking pre-commit hooks:

```
src/app/docs/[[...slug]]/page.tsx(13,24): error TS2339: Property 'body' does not exist on type 'PageData'.
src/app/docs/[[...slug]]/page.tsx(16,28): error TS2339: Property 'toc' does not exist on type 'PageData'.
src/app/docs/[[...slug]]/page.tsx(16,49): error TS2339: Property 'full' does not exist on type 'PageData'.
src/lib/source.ts(22,36): error TS2339: Property 'getText' does not exist on type 'PageData'.
```

## Investigation

These errors exist on `feat/o0o-dev-infrastructure` branch where docs was added.
The fumadocs `InferPageType<typeof source>` is not providing the expected properties.

## Impact

- Blocks git push with pre-commit hooks enabled
- Other branches inheriting from infrastructure get blocked
- Forces use of `--no-verify` to push

## Next Steps

1. Check fumadocs version/types
2. Verify source configuration in `src/lib/source.ts`
3. Update types or code to match fumadocs API
4. Test typecheck passes in docs package

title: Create bd-work and bd-fork scripts for worktree workflow
description:
Create scripts to automate worktree creation with Ghostty integration.

## Scripts to Create

### scripts/bd-work.sh
- Creates sibling worktree at ../worktrees/<bead>-<city>
- Opens new Ghostty tab via AppleScript
- Sets tab title via OSC escape sequence
- Runs bun install
- Launches Claude with --dangerously-skip-permissions and initializer prompt
- Auto-starts work immediately

### scripts/bd-fork.sh  
- Forks current worktree to new one
- Naming: <bead>-<city>-<n> (e.g., n19-tunis-2)
- Same Ghostty/Claude automation

### scripts/cities.txt
Historical Muslim world cities:
- Al-Andalus: cordoba, granada, sevilla, toledo, malaga, zaragoza
- Palestine: quds, gaza, nablus, khalil, jaffa, haifa, akka, ramallah
- Arabian Peninsula: mecca, medina, jeddah, sanaa, muscat, aden
- Historic: baghdad, damascus, cairo, fez, marrakech, tunis, kairouan, samarkand, bukhara, isfahan

## Directory Structure
```
projects/open-harness/
â”œâ”€â”€ open-harness/           # Main repo
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ scripts/
â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ bd-work.sh
```
